title: My Ranked Progress. (Kalista only unless banned.)
body:
I started at plat 3 with 54lp. Been on a losing streak got demoted, currently plat 4 with around 40lp. 

Currently 1 win, 4 loss. As  {{champion:429}} .

Will keep updated.

2 win, 4 loss. ^.^ 55LP plat 4.

2 win, 5 loss 37 lp plat 4.

19lp Lost not as Kalista.

replies.body: With my games that i cant use kalista due to bans or someone else picking her Do you guys just want me to write +- LP or what? How do I tell you what games arent kalista
Haha. That's a solid effort Officer! Maybe I need to add you on my main so you have a decent support hehe! But I believe.
